articles.content: 19.2 V Yudheeswaran to C Sarath Kumar, out Lbw!! Kumar's pyrotechnics come to an end. What a knock! 26-ball 62 and he walks off to a standing ovation. Yudheeswaran stays round the wicket and nails th… [+282 chars]
